oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Dylan Altman - 2017-08-05
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by songwriter Dylan Altman from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on August 5, 2017. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Dylan Altman;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walk-in music / (1:00) Opening comments and introduction by Abi Tapia / (03:35) Opening comments by Dylan Altman / (04:49) Performs Take It On Back / (08:40) Talks about writing the next song / (11:30) Performs Take A Little Ride / (14:43) Talks about writing the next song / (17:40) Performs Country Side Of Heaven / (22:40) Talks about his partnership with Kenny Wayne Shepherd / (2:22) Answers question about why he wanted to be a songwriter and his musical history / (27:08) Answers question about his favorite artist that he's worked with being Steve Cropper / (28:19) Talks about writing the next song / (29:30) Performs Watch The Wind Blow By / (33:29) Talks about the next song / (35:09) Performs Nothing But The Night / (38:54) Answers question about his home town / (39:59) Answers question about how songwriters make money / (41:58) Answers question about writing songs for specific artists / (42:47) Answers question about Cowboy Jack Clement /

(43:29) Answers question about upcoming personal appearances / (43:58) Talks about writing the next song / (47:15) Performs Barefoot Blue Jean Night / (47:53) Closing comments / (57:08) Walk-out music / (50:37) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Altman, Dylan; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
